voice.name: zh-CN-XiaoxiaoMultilingualNeural
voice.s: Katakana is made up of 71 characters. Each character is are made up of consonant-vowel combinations. For example, the character カ (ka) is a combination of the consonant "k" and the vowel "a".∅kstnhmyrwaアカサタナハマヤラワiイキシチニヒミリuウクスツヌフムユルeエケセテネヘメレヱoオコソトノホモヨロヲ
